Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-7264 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.30.3-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-7264 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.30.3-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.30.3-4, affected by CVE-2024-7264
